ygData.subject: Re: Exatcly how to do this.
ygData.msgSnippet: This doesn t make sense at all.  So Magicians are the ONLY ones that have to go out and spend 6-20 platinum on an actual component (a spell) needed for
ygData.messageBody:
This doesn't make sense at all. So Magicians are the ONLY ones that have
to go out and spend 6-20 platinum on an actual component (a spell) needed
for research (which they may already have in their spellbook)?

Zolthar

At 08:14 PM 5/10/99 -0230, you wrote:
>From: Magis <Magis@...>
>
>Steven Zaharakis wrote:
>
>> From: Steven Zaharakis <sz200@...>
>>
>> This still doesn't answer my question.....and I don't mean to be
nasty.
>> There are spells listed under the actual spell you are researching. Are
>> these COMPONENTS to go out and buy and place in there or are you just
>> supposed to have them WRITTEN into your spellbook in order to get the next
>> level of spell through research?
>>
>> Zolthar
>>
>
>I check a few Sources .. Need the Spell Scroll As A component , E.G. 3
items MUST go in so .. 2 Word, and 1
>spell , hmm Think Verdant would make it so it checked you spell book to
see if you had it and TAKE it from There
>..???
>--
>
>Jamie Macdonald
>
>A.K.A
>Magis DarkStone
>Mercenary Mage
>
